com.example.sickar.main.adapters

Class SystemsPagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.viewpager.widget.PagerAdapter
      • androidx.fragment.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
        • com.example.sickar.main.adapters.SystemsPagerAdapter

  • public class SystemsPagerAdapter
extends androidx.fragment.app.FragmentPagerAdapter
    This PagerAdapter hold the displays for multiple Systems.

      • getPageTitle

        @Nullable
public CharSequence getPageTitle(int position)
        This method may be called by the ViewPager to obtain a title string to describe the specified page. This method may return null indicating no title for this page. The default implementation returns null.
        Overrides:
        getPageTitle in class androidx.viewpager.widget.PagerAdapter
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the title requested
        Returns:
        A title for the requested page
